name: Stranger Things: Max Isolation
description:
Welcome to the Upside Down, Max

After the deadly battle at Starcourt, Max's grieving for Billy is cut short when a gate to the Upside Down opens around her. She finds herself in a terrifying forest glen, isolated and alone.

In this classic point and click adventure, you must guide Max as she gathers items and information in her quest to return to the real world. 

Instructions

Point and click with your mouse. Watch the cursor to get hints about areas that can be interacted with. 

Credits

This game was made in a week for the Horror Jam - Isolation. The theme made me think about the Upside Down and what a creepy place it would be to enter by yourself.

This is a fan game and is in no way supported or endorsed by Netflix or the makers of Stranger Things. I just love that show so much, I've always dreamt of doing a fan game for it. I hope the project shows that I'm deeply in love with the world and characters. I tried to do them justice!

  • DESIGN, CODING, VIDEO EDITING - HugBug
  • BACKGROUNDS and CLIPS - Taken from the show. Huge thanks to all of the great YouTubers who gather such useful scene compilations
  • MUSIC from Pond5 and the show
  • SOUNDS from Freesound.org:

HUGBUG SAYS: My only goal is to get better at making games. Really truly. So if you have suggestions, PLEASE TELL ME BY COMMENTING ON MY GAMES! I can take criticism with a grin, and you'll be an awesome person for helping me improve. THANK YOU!
